Nahetu
Nīvaraṇagocchaka
Nīvaraṇasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
55.
2001Nīvaraṇasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ. (1)
2002Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ…pe… . (Yāva asaññasattā. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
